#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType CountryClub.

== Name ==

*[CCountryClub CountryClub]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--CountryClub (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			A country-club is a place where we can find one or more golf courses at the same location.
			Examples are your municipal golf course, a 9 hole pitch and putt, a 36 or more hole golf courses,
			golf resorts, etc.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  (name, [CAddress address], [CContact contact]`*`, [CAmenety amenety]`*`, [CNote note]`*`, [CMedia media]`*`, [CGolfCourse golf-course]+, [CVersion version]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CAddress golfml:Address] || [CAddress address] ||  					Address of the country club or golf course.				 ||
|| [CAmenety golfml:Amenety] || [CAmenety amenety] ||  Amenety available at the contry club ||
|| [CContact golfml:Contact] || [CContact contact] ||  Contact for the golf course ||
|| [CGolfCourse golfml:GolfCourse] || [CGolfCourse golf-course] ||  					Description of one golf course at the country club.				 ||
|| [CMedia golfml:Media] || [CMedia media] ||  Media for the country club ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name of the country club.				 ||
|| [CNote golfml:Note] || [CNote note] ||  					Note about the country club.				 ||
|| [CVersion golfml:Version] || [CVersion version] ||   ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[Egolfml golfml]
----
    <xs:complexType name="CountryClub">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="address" type="golfml:Address">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="contact" type="golfml:Contact">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="amenety" type="golfml:Amenety">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="note" type="golfml:Note">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="media" type="golfml:Media">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="golf-course" type="golfml:GolfCourse">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="version" type="golfml:Version"/>  </xs:sequence></xs:complexType>
----
